definition: A person who explores the depths of bodies of water, typically equipped with specialized gear, in order to study marine life, recover objects, or engage in recreational activities.

examples.german: Der Taucher taucht in die Tiefe des Ozeans.
examples.english: The diver dives into the depths of the ocean.
The diver is wearing a wetsuit.
The diver is using a dive light.

examples.german: Der Taucher schwimmt mit den Fischen.
examples.english: The diver swims with the fish.
